title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
**Introducing the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel!**

**Dreamy Field Edition**

Embark on your next adventure with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle, designed for the modern traveler who values quality, comfort, and style. This 32oz bottle is not just a drink container; it's your perfect companion for sports, travel, and every day.

**Key Features:**

- **Dreamy Field Design:** Embrace the serene beauty of nature with this striking, color-coordinated bottle that blends seamlessly with your outdoor gear.

- **Stainless Steel Construction:** Built to last, our double-wall insulated bottle keeps your drinks cold for up to 24 hours, ensuring you stay hydrated in any environment.

- **FreeSip Spout with Built-In Straw:** Enjoy a seamless drinking experience with the FreeSip spout, featuring a built-in straw and a swig opening for easy sipping. The push-button lid with lock ensures your bottle stays secure and spill-proof.

- **Push-Button Lid:** A simple yet effective design that locks, protects, and opens with just a push, making it easy to use with one hand.

- **Dishwasher Safe Lid:** Easily clean your bottle and lid together in the dishwasher for convenience and hygiene.

- **Hand Wash Only Bottle:** Gentle on your bottle, ensuring it remains in top condition for longer.

- **BPA-Free and Phthalate-Free:** Made with your health in mind, our bottle is free from harmful chemicals to keep you and the environment safe.

- **Wide Opening for Ice:** Enjoy your cold beverages with ease and without worrying about ice cubes clogging your straw.

- **Carry Loop as Lock:** The carry loop not only allows for easy carrying but also doubles as a locking mechanism, providing an added layer of security.

- **Available Sizes:** Choose from 24oz, 32oz, and 40oz options to suit your needs.

- **Limited Lifetime Warranty:** Trust in the durability and reliability of our product, backed by a comprehensive warranty.

**Not Suitable for Hot Liquids:** To maintain the integrity of the bottle and ensure your safety, this bottle is not recommended for hot liquids.

Experience the perfect blend of functionality and style with the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle. Stay hydrated, stay cool, and stay stylish wherever your journey takes you.

**Limited Time Offer:** Get your Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw today and join the community of happy, hydrated adventurers!
